section.heading: Application of subchapter.
section.text: This subchapter applies to registrations of securities in beneficiary form made before or after the effective date of this act [April 27, 2001], by decedents dying on or after the effective date of this act [April 27, 2001].

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 405 of the Uniform Nonprobate Transfers on Death Act (1991 Act).
